summary: This module implements utilities for creating and dispatching Amazon S3 notification events within the Moto mock environment. It defines the set of supported S3 event types, formats event payloads, extracts region information from ARNs, and provides helper functions to forward events to various AWS services such as Lambda, SNS, SQS, and EventBridge.
business_intent: To emulate S3 event notification mechanisms for testing purposes, enabling developers to simulate S3-triggered actions (e.g., Lambda invocations, SNS/SQS messages) without interacting with real AWS infrastructure.
